p: Viral S-glycoprotein, TMPRSS2 and ACE-2 inhibition are important objectives of therapy and probably vaccine development [ 39]. Subunit vaccines are commenced depending on the full-length S protein, receptor-binding domain (RBD), non-RBD S protein fragments, and non-S structural proteins [ 2]. Using structure-based drug screening to detect SARS-CoV-2 protease blockers, macrolides (MAC) were believed to be effective for COVID-19 [ 78].
